ENGLISH: Find the origin of the aggressive crystalline vine growth.
Destroy the origin of the aggressive crystalline vine growth.

First sighted together with emergence of Flurian Omega strain in Metal Valley, Alien Energy Artillery is a downscaled version of its progenitor. What makes the variant extremely dangerous is its ability to spawn octabits on projectile impact.

Emerging at almost the same time as Alien Energy Artillery, the Alien Energy Plasma Tower is a downscaled variant of existing Alien Plasma Tower. It is theorized that someone or something developed the war form for rapid field deployments.

An intriguing war form that appeared with Flurian Omicron strain, Alien Kinetic Artillery resembles an oversized high caliber sniper weapon. While it's uncertain if the war form was a response to Riftbreaker or by chance, its lethality is certain.
A co-emergent to Flurian Omicron and Alien Kinetic Artillery strains, Alien Kinetic Mortar apparently evolved from Alien Plasma Tower to shoot suicidal war forms similar to Alien Energy Artillery.
An unique strain observed to emerge at the same time as Flurian Omicron, Bradron Kinetic had apparently evolved rapid firing kinetic ejector that can pose a substantial threat to Riftbreaker armour.

Bradron Tesla is a rare sub-variant of Bradron Ultra where it mysteriously evolved a way to project electrical arcs that can hit multiple targets at once in front of the alien. It is suspected that the strain emerged as a response to Riftbreaker lightning weapons.

A curious variant of Arachnoids, Magma Arachnoids had evolved to live within harsh volcanic regions of Galatea 37. The variant is almost identical to Magmoths where they eat and secrete highly volatile thermal fluids.

Magma Bomogan is an unique variant of Bomogans whereby the sub-species apparently had co-evolved with Magma Arachnoids. Magma Bomogans are capable to launch special sacks containing molten rock. Worse still, upon Magma Bomogan's sack rupture multiple Morirots will emerge.
A rare and highly dangerous variant of Ultra Bomogans, Omega Bomogans had somehow evolved self-regeneration and special bio-sacks that can temporarily shut down Riftbreaker equipment on contact.

Flurian Omega is a rare and powerful variant of Flurian Ultras whereby the sub-species had apparently evolved self-regeneration. Omega Flurians are almost indistinguishable from Ultra Flurians except their pattern colourations and ability to shoot energy grenades that can disrupt Riftbreaker technologies.

Flurian Omicron is an unique sub variant of Flurian Omega and no less deadly. The sub-species mysteriously lost its progenitor's ability to launch multiple energy grenades and instead able to launch special kinetic projectiles containing suicidal war forms. Extreme caution is advised.

Through some unknown mechanism, the neutral Stonger fauna had evolved into Stonkr variant and incorporated some evolutionary features of Octabits. While Stonkr do not divide upon death, the creature is nonetheless deadly and have perchance of selectively attacking Riftbreaker defense towers in a suicidal charge.

By evolution or some other unknown mechanism, Vathamite in the wild were observed to evolve into deadlier, self-replicating Acidus strain. These creatures are intensely attracted to Riftbreaker energy emissions and would literally explode in shower of concentrated acid when they get close enough.

A rare variant of Ultra Zorants that can only be found in certain areas of Galatea 37 radioactive deserts, Hyper Zorants had somehow evolved a way to lob bio-energy sacks over short obstacles. While the reason behind this evolution is unclear, it is theorized that Zorants are adapting to Riftbreakers' incursions.
One of most dangerous variants of Zorants would be Super Zorant
POLISH: the desert creature had mysteriously grown a bio-energized ejector that is analogous to railgun technology employed by Riftbreakers. It is unknown on how such strain emerged, but one thing for certain Super Zorants necessitates extreme caution.

ENGLISH: Through coincidence or convergent evolution, some Ultra Zorants were found to evolve into Omega strain that have self-regeneration. What makes them even more dangerous is their capability to shoot bio-projectiles that can interfere with Riftbreaker equipment.

A rarely seen strain of Octabits, Octabit Omega species are markedly faster and have limited self-regeneration. Worryingly, the strain had somehow evolved to be able to disrupt Riftbreaker equipment on suicide.
Redesigned condensate reaction matrices allow increased supercoolant generation from titanium.
Introduction of energy metamaterials and titano-ferdonite compounds further enhance supercoolant production.
Redesigned synchrotrons allow better ionization of titanium into plasma.
Introduction of higher power accelerators further boost titanium conversion into plasma.
Overcharge built-in Mr. Riggs's Rift Teleporter to distort surrounding space, causing localized time warp and tremendous gravity damage.
The Advanced Protocol have enhanced dilation duration and gravity damage thanks to addition of redundant power supplies.
This Superior version of Gravity Shockwave extends Advanced protocol efficiencies with help of better interface materials.
The ultimate version of Gravity Shockwave have highest possible time dilation and gravity damage, made plausible with special supporting subsystems.
Research into Petra Magneticus and ferdonite crystals allow creation of Gravity Shockwave, a special skill that can distort space to cause localized time dilation and tremendous gravity damage.
Addition of new energy conduits and secondary capacitors enable more consistent triggers and longer time distortion for Gravity Shockwave protocol.
Incorporation of novel palladio-ferdonite superalloys and new energy mesh topology enable greater time warp and devastating gravity damage.
Introduction of dedicated conduits and quantum oracles lead to real-time adaptation to flunctuating quantum space field for absolute maximum Gravity Shockwave protocol efficiencies.
Discharge Mr. Riggs internal gluon fusion field powerplant to generate huge amount of radiation and simultaneously restore damaged mecha components.
This Advanced protocol have higher radiation damage and self-repair capabilities due to optimization of radiation delivery and mecha design.
Superior version of Radiation Burst protocol further improves upon Advanced version thanks to enhanced radiation channeling and materials.
The ultimate version of Radiation Burst exhibit greatest radiation damage and self-repair capabilities with help of special control systems.
Investigation of desert biome creatures and tanzanite kinematics lead to Radiation Burst protocol that repurpose Mr.Riggs reactor emissions to both damage enemies and, repair Mecha superstructure.
Redesigned reactor interface and rearranged mecha superstructure allow improved Radiation Burst that exhibit higher radiation damage and, self-repair efficiency.
Integration of novel tanzanite complex alloys and redesigned radiation channeling enable denser radiation projection and higher self-repairing abilities of Radiation Burst.
Addition of quantum sensors and special algorithms enable real time control of radiation discharge for greater damage and repairing capabilities of Radiation Burst protocol.

Generates huge amount of energy using uranium. Produces radioactive gas as byproduct. Requires constant water or supercoolant to function.
Harnesses natural decay of morphium to produce energy and special byproducts.

Understanding reservoir dynamics and creation of real time modeling allow higher liquid outputs.

Teleports discrete amount of energies into the rift to be received by Rift Energy Receiver. Requires supercoolant to function.
Receives transmitted energies from Rift Energy Teleporter. Produces plasma as a byproduct.
Synthesizes cobalt from carbonium and ironium.
Synthesizes uranium ore from ironium and cobalt.
Synthesizes processed uranium from ironium and cobalt.
Synthesizes palladium from uranium and cobalt.

Condenses water from the atmosphere by using energy and titanium.
Produces mud from water and carbonium.
Produces sludge from mud and flammable gas.
Produces magma by melting carbonium and ironium with flammable gas.
Produces some resources from mixing magma and water. Produces radioactive gas as a byproduct.
Refines crude uranium into uranium and produces radioactive gas as a byproduct. Requires constant flow of sludge to operate.
Compact mini nuclear reactor. Produces radioactive gas as byproduct. Requires constant flow of coolants to operate.
Produces plasma by using energy and flammable gas.
This technology is a collection of adjunct processes that support base operations of Riftbreakers in distant locations.

Incorporation of newer alloys and redesigned reaction-volumes allow increased efficiencies and yields.
Synthesizes hazenite from sludge and cobalt. Produces hazenite flue as a byproduct.
Synthesizes tanzanite from hazenite flue, radioactive gas and carbonium. Produces tanzanite vapor as a byproduct.
Synthesizes rhodonite from tanzanite vapor, sludge and palladium. Produces rhodonite condensate as a byproduct.
Synthesizes ferdonite from rhodonite condensate, magma and titanium. Produces ferdonite plasma and radioactive gas as byproducts.

Incorporation of better designed fluid reactors and fluid handling systems increase reaction yields.
Breaks down hazenite into hazenite flue and cobalt by using flammable gas and water.

Redesigned converters and improved protocols lead to better overall process yields.
